EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-23 Cloud Status Quo.ES-2019-01-16 Invite 2.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} I would like to help you optimize cloud costs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=70157000001j596AAA]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=70157000001j596AAA]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Gartner predicts that by 2020 organizations that lack cost optimization processes will average 40% overspend in the public cloud. It shouldn't have to be this way for you and your team. Join me for the “How to Beat the Cloud Status Quo <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=70157000001j596AAA]]>” webinar, where you will learn:
- How organizations are negatively impacted by the cloud cost break-fix loop
- The key factors that collectively drive cost optimization in the cloud
- How to quantifiably improve performance and reduce costs in the cloud
Continuous cost optimization is key to unlocking scalability, agility, and operational efficiency.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-cloud-status-quo/?utm_campaign=70157000001j596AAA]]>
All registered guests will be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there.
Thanks,
Mor Cohen CTO, Cloud, Turbonomic
